headline: Tattoos not healing as they should
content: I have two tattoos I've gotten that took much longer than average time for a tattoo to heal but they also healed extremely dark and not how they were originally supposed to be. Anyone have any insight as to why that might be?
author: kingbetes

headline: Mood changes with Type 1 diabetes..
content: Sometimes my older brother who's a Type 1 diabetic will have random mood swings. Does that have anything to do with his glucose levels?
author: mcreyes19
